narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: 1st Aide Home Care, Inc. (cdpap) is a Home Health provider based in Jackson Heights, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $16.9M in Medicaid payments across 123K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $16.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
